content: this closet staple is the perfect top for beginners looking to take the plunge into making garments this tutorial walks you through not only the steps but the thought process behind designing this top so you can make it exactly to your liking and apply these skills to future projects as well sizing - made to measure gauge - 23st x 28 row for truboo on 4mm needles however feel free to use the yarn and needle size to create a fabric to your liking yarn recommendations - this pattern has been tested using berroco modern cotton dk and lion brand truboo any yarns that produce a drapey fabric would be great for this pattern i recommend any rayon or cotton-rayon blends
